name: Tabby Cat's Great Catventure
description:
Made for Games On Demand, Tabby Cat's Great Catventure is a game conceptualized both visually and game design-wise by Benjamin.

In this simple 2D Platform autorruner you and your friends can play as both Tabby The Cat and TibTub the Balloon Kitten who go in an adventure after the evil Wizard of The Mice. This bad sorcerer doesn't want any cats having fun in his land and released his mice minions all over the Kat Kingdom to steal the cat's toys.

Team:

Art, Animation Code, & Music :JG Guimarães

Concept art, Game Design & UI:  Benjamin

Controls:

This game is meant to be played on tablet, but it can also be played on the keyboard:

Tabby Jump: A, S, Z or X

TibTub yarn attack: K, L, N or M
